issue.title: [CF 1374] Combo Points condition max value
issue.body:
TMW v8.2.5: 

If I'm not mistaken, currently, when setting up a Combo Points icon condition, max value is 8 and cannot be increased.

 

In game, max number of combo points a rogue could have is 10 (with Anticipation talent).


> Posted by CurseForge user nordveien | Imported from CurseForge issue #1374 | Raw

comments.body:
Thank you for the quick fix.

Edited Feb 12, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user nordveien
